text: Chef is a 2014 American comedy-drama movie. It was directed, written and produced by Jon Favreau. It stars Favreau, Robert Downey, Jr., Scarlett Johansson, Sof√≠a Vergara, Dustin Hoffman, Oliver Platt, and John Leguizamo. It was released on May 9, 2014 to positive reviews.
